name: Principles and Practices in Science Education
description: Fundamental principles and practices in education and public outreach in the sciences, mathematics, and engineering, including education research, curriculum, teaching, and assessment. Students will learn and apply effective strategies which engage and educate learners at the K-16 and public level. The course assignments include a project and/or placement experience.
prerequisites: At least 8.0 credits, and enrolment in a science, mathematics, or engineering program
